body.name: Hansleep Memory Foam Twin Size Mattress Topper, Twin Cooling Mattress Pad with Deep Pocket, Breathable Air Twin Mattress Cover, 39x75 Inches, Charcoal
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 36 mins
features: SUPPORTIVE MEMORY FOAM LAYER: Hansleep memory foam mattress topper boasts a unique structure that combines a gel-infused memory foam layer and down alternative fillings. This design ensures weight distribution is even and pressure is relieved from different points of the body. It's an excellent addition for a firm mattress.

PREMIUM BAMBOO SURFACE: This mattress topper features a breathable bamboo surface that wicks away night sweat. Combined with the cooling gel infused in the memory foam, it provides a cool and comfortable sleep environment.
DEEP POCKET DESIGN: The deep pocket memory foam mattress pad can stretch up to 21 inches deep, ensuring it fits snugly on any mattress and stays in place throughout the night.

EASY TO INSTALL & MAINTAIN: The fitted sheet design of this mattress cover makes it incredibly easy to install on your mattress. It is also machine washable, which means it can be effortlessly cleaned and maintained, providing you with an effortless and hassle-free experience.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Hansleep mattress topper comes vacuum-packed and may appear thinner upon unpacking. Please allow it two days to regain its shape and thickness. It's machine washable with cold water on a gentle cycle and tumble dry low. Ironing and dry cleaning are not recommended.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Provide You with Easy and Comfortable Sleeping Conditions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a surprise! Purchased this for our air mattress that we used during the holidays. This topper gave us the layer of warmth, noise cancellation and added padding we needed to make an air mattress sleep able. It’s not extremely thick so can be rolled up and transported without taking up to much space. It has been a life saver. Price was also amazing and would recommend for any bed or even as an air mattress topper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my daughter's bed. She absolutely loves it. So thick, soft and comfortable. It's hard for her to get out of bed now! I will soon be purchasing one for my bed. The quality is excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mattress topper is decent and adds just barely enough comfort to a very cheap mattress. The pros: it does help my child to sleep cooler than a memory foam mattress topper allowed. The cons: it is just not all that fluffy. From the product images, I was expecting a bit more fluff. I'm not the one sleeping on it, it's my kid, and no complaints from her, just complaints from my back when I'm sitting in their bed to sing/read before bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Slept Good !
reviews.reviewText: I think I read you have to wait 48hrs for it to inflate I didn’t wait 48hrs nor did I put it in the dryer. I was too excited to put the mattress topper on my bed. I deal with chronic back pain. These past few days I’ve slept peacefully and it has alleviated most of my pain. I didn’t want to buy another mattress at the moment because I’m moving soon and getting a bigger bed. This was worth buying and it didn’t smell. I love the coolness from the mattress. I would recommend buying this topper. I forgot to take before and after pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth it!
reviews.reviewText: I normally don’t leave Amazon reviews but absolutely had to with this one! I received the topper today and couldn’t wait to throw it on my bed. If you’re impatient (like me) and don’t want to wait 48 hours for air to inflate just throw it in the dryer for 10-15 mins and follow up with a hair dryer to work out the wrinkles! Super comfy already. Also make sure the tag side / memory foam side is facing up not the other way around. There’s a reason the white options looks a little blue in the pictures :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't get it if you plan on washing it! DESTROYED in 1st wash.
reviews.reviewText: I didn't believe many of the reviews on here about the lumps after first wash, maybe they did something wrong? But it's true! This is a nice mattress topper IF you do not plan on ever washing it. This is mind blowing to me because it is bedding and needs to be washed! Especially with it having a chemical smell out of the packaging.My son was so happy when he got it and it looked beautiful and so cozy. I went to the tag and followed instructions, delicate and cold wash. I dried on tumble low and then hung to finish drying. I treated it very delicately because of fear of these lumps people or posting pictures of.It is finally dry and LUMPS of gel memory foam everywhere inside!. Worst part, the foam looks like it ripped inside the center leaving no foam at all in center. After searching for weeks for a perfect topper for my child I grabbed this one because it looked nice and was on a lightning deal, cant beat ti!. But now I see why the price, it is a one time use topper. I've never been so disappointed because my son was so happy for it and now is sad because he can't use it! Tag should say SPOT CLEAN ONLY, No wash! But bedding needs to be washed so this is ridiculous! I'm guessing the people leaving good reviews have not washed it yet. I have to wash everything that I buy that goes in contact with skin, I regret this purchase! Wish I added a other 35 and bought a better quality topper. ☹️*UPDATE*Had to add some stars for great customer service. They offered to send my son a new one. I will not be washing it this time! In future, for the price, I can repurchase a new one instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brought my mattress back to life - get it!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has bought various toppers before, ranging from egg crate foam toppers, flat memory foam toppers, and down alternative pocketed toppers (that are more like an extra sheet on a mattress).... I honestly didn't expect much after I got this topper out of the packaging. It wasn't very thick, so I imagined I would sink and it's contents would push around my body rendering it useless. But that is not the case. The inch and a half plushness may as well be 3 inches. Lying on my bed with this topper, it feels so plush... It has brought my mattress back to life and my bed is more comfortable than it ever was. I did buy this on sale... if you find it on sale, you should go ahead and get it. It is worth every penny and more! I will come back and buy this anytime I need a topper in the future, for sure!🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟Edited to add: I notice a lot of reviewers that weren't happy with the topper have it inside out. Make sure the tag is on the outside. The gel memory foam should be on top and the down filling should be on the bottom. I think the down filling at the bottom and the gel foam on top is why it's so plush, the down filling holds the gel foam up. This is why it doesn't spread and stays plush under your body. Inside out/upside down, I don't think the topper would have the same effects.2nd Edit - It's been nearly 4 months since my initial review. Since then I have enjoyed sleeping with this topper on my mattress. I also had one delivered to my stepdad for his birthday. He now loves this mattress topper as much as I do and says it saved him from having to buy a new mattress right now. If you do get this topper, it's important to let it expand and to put it on correctly. If you do both, you won't be disappointed. This however, is not an actual mattress, but if you just need a more comfortable mattress and better nights sleep... You won't be disappointed.I am going to order another topper after my deluxe air mattress is delivered. Hoping it will allow an air mattress when camping to feel more like my mattress at home. I will update my review then also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow top!
reviews.reviewText: This product makes my bed so comfortable!! Easy to put on your mattress!

I bought this to refresh an older mattress hoping to not have to replace it. It's really comfortable and works exactly as I hoped. Very nice to sleep on. Fits my mattress perfectly. I'm really happy with this, no complaints!

I purchased the mattress for my 86 year old mom. She was constantly having back pain. Since using the nice soft Memory Foam Mattress Cover, it has helped A lot. Should have got one a few Years Sooner.
I liked it - quality good - filling a bit lacking
There wasn’t any form as they advertised. I was very disappointed and returned it
